A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought the movie was incredibly well done. I think this served as the passing of the torch from a Luke's generation to Rey's. I thought the new direction and capabilities that the force is taking is great and shows creativity. Also the movie was not at all predicable which is good because I was worried that an 8th movie would just take ideas from other movies but I felt this movie did a nice job of creating a nostalgic and Star Wars feel while also being totally original. I release it has taken some heat by unsettled fans but I feel that their distaste is unwarranted because they are not considering the fact that it's a trilogy and this is just the second movie. Overall this was one of my favorite Star Wars films to date.
